items.summary: Update the mobile number validation in AdmissionFormPage.tsx to accept exactly 10-digit Indian mobile numbers (e.g., 9450956184). The field must remain mandatory. The error message should read: 'कृपया 10 अंकों का वैध मोबाइल नंबर दर्ज करें' (e.g., example: 9450956184). Remove any Pakistani format (03001234567) validation logic.

Update the mobile number validation in backend/main.mo to accept exactly 10-digit Indian mobile numbers (digits only, no leading zero or country code required). Remove any validation that enforces Pakistani format (11 digits starting with 03).
